title: A mian riang maw Van mi a lo piang
lyrics:
A mia'n riang maw, Van mi a lo piang,
Bethlehem bawng in tlawm a nghak e;
Amah chu mihring leh Pathian ani,
Lal leh Chhandamtu nih a fawm.

Hlimtakin Amah i fak ang u,
Min Chhandam turin a inngaitlawm;
Rupui rawh se aw, rupui ber rawh se,
Pathian kan hnena 1u thleng hi.

A lalna thuruk mite'n an hriat loh,
Chatuana Pa angchhunga mi chu;
Mi fingte leh a Lalna Arsi nen,
Van mipuiten an rawn puang ta.

Hlimin i au ang, Lal thar a piang ta,
Thinlongin Amah chu i bia ang;
Edum rimtui leh Rangkachak ai chuan,
Thinlonga tawngtai a hlo zawk.
